shipping.shipping_method_notice: Free Shipping is 5-14+ day delivery. Will Call is immediately ready for pick-up M-F 8:00am-5:30pm. 2-Day Shipping is 2-4 day delivery. See Terms and Conditions for complete Shipping Policy. *PLEASE NOTE* Although the option may be given for FedEx to deliver to your PO Box, the package WILL ship USPS since FedEx cannot deliver to a PO Box.
